EmailTemplate.description: To notify the Salesperson that the boat has been built for their customer and needs to be inspected prior to being brought out of the Shop
EmailTemplate.name: Salesperson Inspection
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Inspect your Customer's Boat :)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!AcctSeed__Project__c.Salesperson__c},
The boat for {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeed__Account__c} has been Rigged. Closer to the Delivery Date, when the boat is prepped for pick up, please look it over and ensure that your customer will be 100% satisfied with their decision to choose Legend Boats. If you're happy, they'll be happy!
Please change the Stage to Pending Pickup once complete
Thank you
